overview: Linda is Melissa's mother.  Chris is Linda's boyfriend.  When Linda catches Chris and Melissa she throws Melissa out of the house.  Melissa moves in with Uncle Phil, who owns some adult video stores.  Melissa, Amy, and Beth decide to take Phil up on his offer to manage one of the stores.  They decide to up store traffic by offering sex with a movie rental.
tagline: Come to the video store where membership has more than privileges!
title: Hot Blooded
